activities: B&H is a retailer of photo, video and professional audio products. Orders can be placed via telephone, catalogue, or through its secure website www.bhphotovideo.com and are shipped worldwide. Customer data is received for order processing and customer support. In order to prevent fraud B&H uses identification verification procedures.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
